website_summaries.verdict: Includes both magnetic drivers and hollow body nut setters in the set for good versatility.
pros: Well-organized set that ships in its own carrying case
6 magnetic drivers with socket sizes from 1/4 to 9/16 inches
Tough drivers will work both with hand driving and power impact drivers
Medium length on shanks of 1/4 to 9/16 inches works in many different instances
cons: Carrying case may not last for the long haul
No hand driver included in the set

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing, and the carry case holds them securely.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!! One row is magnetic nut drivers, and the other row is non-magnetized so that the middle can be hollow to function as a deep well. These have held up really well to frequent usage. The carry case is cheap plastic, BUT it holds the drivers very securely. No matter how hard you shake the case, or let it bounce around in your toolbox, it WILL hold the drivers in their correct potions.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: If you have been a fan of my reviews, and you know who you are, you know that I wax eloquent about tools. I used to wax my mustache but now only tools. The nut drivers are strong and are a great addition to any shop or work truck. Go ahead, spend the ten bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Not Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Case could be better
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to find hollow stem nut setters at all now but I've never seen another set that actually goes up to 9/16". If you install garage doors for a living this is the set to get
customer_reviews.author: rigs

customer_reviews.title: Missing driver
customer_reviews.text: A nice well-made set but the 5/16 driver was not even in the box but I had several already so I didn’t feel like sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: TWJ in Florida

customer_reviews.title: I also liked the price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set in a well made carry case
customer_reviews.author: Thomas nash

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case and good tools.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and a very nice case. I needed the 9/16 and I am glad this kit had it with it drilled out so it works on nuts too.
customer_reviews.author: Ambcurt

customer_reviews.title: only about 3/16 of an inch though so it might be a risk of rounding over the head on bolts or screws made of poor
customer_reviews.text: These seem extremely well built impact nut drivers. the magnetic part of the set doesn't have much depth, only about 3/16 of an inch though so it might be a risk of rounding over the head on bolts or screws made of poor metal
customer_reviews.author: T. Vik

customer_reviews.title: Was not magnetic
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of time to return (my fault) but I bought these and they were definitely not magnetic. May have just been a "bad one" but non the less it is not what it says it is and never got to use them still in package.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Just average.
customer_reviews.text: These nut setters are just an average product for a good price. The case is ridiculous as it does not hold the nut setters in place. Like one of the other reviewers of this product, I cut a piece of cardboard out to put inside to hold everything in place. The locking latch is flimsy and will not hold up in the long term. Still, the size selection is good, and it will come in handy I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cheval

customer_reviews.title: I've had many nutsetters- these are head & shoulders above the best of the others
customer_reviews.text: This is a set of tools I couldn't get along without, I've used them a lot in my shop. I've had many nutsetters- these are head & shoulders above the best of the others! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: roza745

customer_reviews.title: Quality and good value.
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been flawless. Having both styles(w and w/o magnet)of nutsetter is more valuable than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: these will never break. The magnetic will not allow for a really good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio J.

customer_reviews.title: This product is the s***. I have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the s***. I have been using these nut drivers for over a year, building Racks mounting panels, transformers, gears, etc. these things come through every time and they snap right into your impact driver. They're aren't deep which is the only thing I would change about it. My advice, buy the kit half have magnets the other half are deeper..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up to every day use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold up well so far using in my impact drivers
customer_reviews.author: Bettesdockdoor

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Added this set after buying the metric set by mistake. This set is like the other, in a nice handy case, has larger sizes which I was looking for and the quality is good. Plus the magnetic and non-magnetic sizes work for me also. Good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Steveguy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pot metal
customer_reviews.text: First nut split the nut driver wide open before it was even close to tight.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: One of the drivers broke and Snap instantly on one use. Very unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have on the job
customer_reviews.text: Super nice set. One side has the magnet in the bit and the other side does not for longer studs.
customer_reviews.author: David Cress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set. Easy to use, strong. Two of every size so I put one set in each tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Woodruff's

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my job, love that it Comes hollow shank and magnetic
customer_reviews.author: Jake Barngraff

customer_reviews.title: but very well made and a nice case. Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but very well made and a nice case. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: A complete set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set worth the money would buy more tools of this brand I got sae and metrics sets in cases so you can be organized
customer_reviews.author: wakeeone

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KIT
customer_reviews.text: I USE THIS KIT AT WORK ALL THE TIME. FITS ALL THE LAG BOLTS ON EQUIPMENT I WORK ON AND OPENING ALL CRATES. GREAT AROUND THE HOUSE. EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE ONE AT HOME OR IN THE CAR. EXCELLENT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: C. Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Use these in the commercial HVAC industry. I love them and so does everyone else that "barrows" them from me.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought sets of these in both standard and metric and so far have been very satisfied with both performance and durability for the price I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Six to one….1/2 dozen to the other

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Good i like having one with magnet and one that is hollow of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: High-quality nutdrivers and a nice strong case to put them in
customer_reviews.text: High-quality nutdrivers and a nice strong case to put them in
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: On time and as advertised. Perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: Look to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my Drill and impact bag, not sure why they are broke out into one set of magnetic and one set without magnets? but I'm sure for someones application it makes a difference
customer_reviews.author: akajjmon

customer_reviews.title: Nut Drive Kit
customer_reviews.text: well made & magnetic force is strong enough to hold bit for work
customer_reviews.author: kysmet

customer_reviews.title: nut setters
customer_reviews.text: here again just got to look at them. like the quality of the product give a better rating when I use them
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: At last someone made a set of nut drivers that hold up!
customer_reviews.author: ChurchTechie

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have.
customer_reviews.text: Nice complete set. Nicer if the magnetic set was marked different from the recessed set but just colored one set black. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Winter Rider

customer_reviews.title: Every size I need
customer_reviews.text: The set includes sizes 1/4 to 9/16, which is all you'd need for a 1/4 drive impact driver. I've used the set for about a month now to loosen or tighten nuts, and drive in lag bolts, and haven't noticed any cracking on the bits. This is a great set.
customer_reviews.author: R. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR IMPACT, for *drivers* only.  Contains 6 magnetic & 6 non-magnetic nut-drivers...
customer_reviews.text: These are for drill/driver type things, NOT for impact-drivers. Yes they are properly made, yes sometimes being able to NOT magnetize things is needed ( or outright a blessing! ) sometimes you aren't even allowed to have magnets touching what you're working on... but I wish they'd been clearer that these are not impact-capable. So, I'll STILL have to find/buy the Makita set... HTH!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Awesome has size stamped on side, that's what I was looking for. Also built strong!!!
customer_reviews.author: ACQC

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice set - it's great to have both magnetic and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set - it's great to have both magnetic and hollow shanks in the same sizes, and very nice to have a sticker with the inventory inside the case lid. I dropped one star only because it would have been nice to have some way to distinguish the metric and SAE cases - maybe mold them in different colors, for example. I just wrote "METRIC" on the outside of the metric ones with a Sharpie, but that's kind of lame.
customer_reviews.author: Flymo Mulch

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They do good job a lil shallow but stil good
customer_reviews.author: Tony BK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the case and that there is doubles of all bits
customer_reviews.author: derrick sharp

customer_reviews.title: Handy Nut Driver Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is about all you will need with your 1/4" impact wrench. This set includes from 1/4" to 9/16" with one set recessed and the other set magnetized. I also purchased the metric set that includes from 8mm to 14 mm. Most complete set I have been able to find. I am very pleased with the purchase I made.
customer_reviews.author: T. Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Good tools fair case
customer_reviews.text: I like these tools, the bits work good but the case needs to be made so the bits don't fall out of place when you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Starrider

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic ones useless..
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the magnetic ones,. They are so weak that there useless,. NOT HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.author: OM

customer_reviews.title: Bought for son. A former mechanic at a department ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son. A former mechanic at a department store, he was wanting some tools to work on his car at home. These were on his wish list.
customer_reviews.author: beaderdeb

customer_reviews.title: Power Nut Driver Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to fit my Bosch Impact driver. They work fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: jaxmike

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy set to have when using any kind of 1/4" driver.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed to do the job, the most complete qualiy set at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Richard Z. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that the hollow center of the nutsetter would be deeper. This one doesn't work for my application. Not saying the set is not good, just not what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: John Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set. Use it almost every day. Great Price
customer_reviews.author: Dave Emerson

product_meta.title: VIM Tools NS100 12-Piece SAE Power Drive Nut Setter with Magnetic and Hollow Point Drivers
product_meta.description: This 12-Piece SAE Power Drive Nut Setter with Magnetic and Hollow Point Drivers includes 6 magnetic nut setters and 6 hollow body nut setters. Most complete set of nut-setters anywhere. Impact quality drivers that can be used with hand drivers or today's new cordless quick change Impact drivers. 1/4 inch Hex power drive shanks and bits are 2-9/16 inch long.
feature_bullets: Impact quality power drive nut setters with a lifetime warranty
6 piece magnetic drivers 1/4 inch thru 9/16 inch
6 piece hollow body nut setters 1/4 inch thru 9/16 inch
Heat treated, cold forged-high alloy steel
Comes in a plastic storage case with parts list

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
